wordquizzle.wqserver

Class EventHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • wordquizzle.wqserver.EventHandler

  • public class EventHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    The EventHandler class implements the parsing and dispatching of the various messages to the appropriate MessageHandler.
